MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH43, EH44 and EH45 postcode area of Walkerburn, Innerleithen and Peebles. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:38am due to a grounded overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:45am on Friday, 04 December 2020
